subject: Tech Daily: AI Revolution is Here
body: Here are the top stories for today: 1. AI is changing everything. 2. New JS framework released. 3. Python 4.0 rumors.

subject: URGENT: Q3 Report Due
body: Hi, I need the Q3 report on my desk by Friday 5 PM. Please prioritize this.

body: Hey, want to grab lunch tomorrow at 12:30? There's a new taco place.

body: Click here to claim your free cruise vacation! Limited time offer.
